about_the_game:
WATCH OUT: THEY’RE COMING! Can YOU stop them before they reach Turrick?

Enjoy the CARTOON GRAPHICS: reach every destination and enjoy colorful levels and goofy characters! Don’t get distracted: they might seem friendly… But they’re ready to take over the whole Kingdom!

Play it STRATEGICALLY: kill ‘em all! Up your arsenal and upgrade your towers with archers, wizards, engineers, soldiers and much more at your disposal!

Epic Features

  • BUILD your TEAM with Heroes and Pets!
  • MANAGE 5 Heroes at the SAME TIME.
  • UPGRADE Heroes and EVOLVE Pets to become stronger!
  • MEET every Hero and their SUPER-POWERS: LIGHT, VANPIRISM, FIRE, WIND or HEALING!
  • UNLOCK every BUILDING and their UPGRADES!
  • 23 unique LEVELS to PLAY!
  • 50+ unique MONSTERS to KILL!
  • DISCOVER the TALENT-TREE-SYSTEM and make your team STRONGER!
  • DESTROY your enemies with ELEMENTAL GOLEMS, THUNDERBOLTS and much MORE!
  • COME BACK everyday to get your DAILY PRIZE!
  • ENJOY both the STORY MODE and the SURVIVAL MODE!
detailed_description:
WATCH OUT: THEY’RE COMING! Can YOU stop them before they reach Turrick?

Enjoy the CARTOON GRAPHICS: reach every destination and enjoy colorful levels and goofy characters! Don’t get distracted: they might seem friendly… But they’re ready to take over the whole Kingdom!

Play it STRATEGICALLY: kill ‘em all! Up your arsenal and upgrade your towers with archers, wizards, engineers, soldiers and much more at your disposal!

Epic Features

  • BUILD your TEAM with Heroes and Pets!
  • MANAGE 5 Heroes at the SAME TIME.
  • UPGRADE Heroes and EVOLVE Pets to become stronger!
  • MEET every Hero and their SUPER-POWERS: LIGHT, VANPIRISM, FIRE, WIND or HEALING!
  • UNLOCK every BUILDING and their UPGRADES!
  • 23 unique LEVELS to PLAY!
  • 50+ unique MONSTERS to KILL!
  • DISCOVER the TALENT-TREE-SYSTEM and make your team STRONGER!
  • DESTROY your enemies with ELEMENTAL GOLEMS, THUNDERBOLTS and much MORE!
  • COME BACK everyday to get your DAILY PRIZE!
  • ENJOY both the STORY MODE and the SURVIVAL MODE!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9+
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Ancient Tower

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista/XP
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The monsters are coming to invade our kingdom. Can you help our guild to stop them? Play it BEAUTIFULLY: the ultimate tower defense game has finally arrived. An epic guild of epic Heroes, dozens of angry monsters, amazing powers, golems, a lot of different and unique colorful levels is what is waiting for you in Ancient Tower.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
